channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: 法廷文書：ジュリアン・アサンジは米国との司法取引の一環として有罪を認め、英国の刑務所で5年間過ごした後釈放される予定（NBCニュース）
item.description:
NBC News:
Court docs: Julian Assange plans to plead guilty as part of a plea deal with the US that will allow him to go free after spending five years in a British prison  —  The WikiLeaks founder has been held in a prison outside London for the last five years and fought extradition to the United States.

item.title: MTVがMTVニュースのウェブサイトを完全に閉鎖し、20年分のコンテンツをアーカイブから削除した模様、パラマウント・グローバルは2023年にMTVニュースを閉鎖（Todd Spangler/Variety）
item.description:
Todd Spangler / Variety:
MTV appears to have fully pulled down MTV News website, scrubbing two decades' worth of content from its archives; Paramount Global shut down MTV News in 2023  —  Some two decades' worth of content published on MTVNews.com is no longer available after MTV appears to have fully pulled down the site.

item.title: 情報筋英国警察はウィル・ルイスを電話ハッキング捜査の障害とみなし、原告側はルイスがニューズ・コーポレーションの電子メール削除に「ゴーサイン」を出したと言う（ニューヨーク・タイムズ）。
item.description:
New York Times:
Sources: UK police saw Will Lewis as an impediment to their phone hacking investigation; plaintiffs say Lewis gave the “green light” to delete News Corp. emails  —  Will Lewis, now the publisher of the Washington Post, was in full crisis mode in 2011.

item.title: 米破産裁判所の管財人が、アレックス・ジョーンズが支払うべき15億ドルの訴訟判決の支払いのため、インフォウォーズを閉鎖し、その資産を清算する計画を明らかにした（Dave Collins/Associated Press）。
item.description:
Dave Collins / Associated Press:
A US bankruptcy court trustee discloses plans to shut down Infowars and liquidate its assets to help pay the $1.5B in lawsuit judgments that Alex Jones owes  —  A U.S. bankruptcy court trustee is planning to shut down conspiracy theorist Alex Jones' Infowars media platform and liquidate …

item.title: TikTokのクリエイターのなかには、RFK Jr.のようなサードパーティーの候補者を招いて独自のタウンホールを開催し、主流メディアを迂回し、しばしば陰謀を宣伝している者もいる（Makena Kelly/Wired）
item.description:
Makena Kelly / Wired:
Some TikTok creators are hosting their own town halls with third-party candidates like RFK Jr., bypassing mainstream media and often platforming conspiracies  —  TikTok creators are hosting their own town halls with third-party candidates, bypassing mainstream media and platforming conspiracies.

item.title: 8月20日より、広告なしのParamount+ With Showtimeプランが1ドル値上げの月額12.99ドルに、広告ありのParamount+ Essentialプランが2ドル値上げの7.99ドルになる（Todd Spangler/Variety）
item.description:
Todd Spangler / Variety:
Prices of ad-free Paramount+ With Showtime plan will rise by $1 to $12.99/month, and of Paramount+ Essential plan with ads by $2 to $7.99, starting August 20  —  As Paramount Global looks to push its streaming business into the black, it's hiking the prices for most Paramount+ plans later this summer.

item.title: CNNは木曜日のバイデン対トランプの討論会を全面的に担当する。
item.description:
Michael M. Grynbaum / New York Times:
CNN is in charge of every aspect of Thursday's Biden-Trump debate, a major shift from previous years; rival channels will leave CNN's on-air watermark untouched  —  One network is in charge of every aspect of the Biden-Trump debate, a major shift from previous years.  Tens of millions of viewers are expected to be watching.

item.title: RIAA、AI音楽サービス「Suno」と「Udio」に対する2件の著作権侵害訴訟を提訴、Udioはバイラル曲「BBL Drizzy」の制作に利用された（Mia Sato/The Verge）
item.description:
Mia Sato / The Verge:
The RIAA files two copyright-infringement cases against the AI music services Suno and Udio; Udio was used to create the viral song BBL Drizzy  —  A group of record labels including the big three — Universal Music Group (UMG), Sony Music Entertainment, and Warner Records …

item.title: 申請中：ビベック・ラマスワミのBuzzFeed株は8.9％に増加：ラマスワミ氏は最近ジョナ・ペレッティ氏に会い、パトリック・ベット＝デヴィッド氏ら2人の取締役就任を望んでいる（Dan Primack/Axios）
item.description:
Dan Primack / Axios:
Filing: Vivek Ramaswamy's BuzzFeed stake grew to 8.9%; sources: Ramaswamy recently met Jonah Peretti and wants Patrick Bet-David and two others on the board  —  - Ramaswamy has continued to increase his stake, this morning disclosing that it's risen to 8.9%.

item.title: 情報筋BuzzFeedはHot OnesのオーナーであるFirst We Feastの売却に苦戦中。
item.description:
Lucas Shaw / Bloomberg:
Sources: BuzzFeed is struggling to sell Hot Ones owner First We Feast, which is profitable and has ~$30M revenue per year; interested parties balk at $70M price  —  - Several parties are interested but balk at $70 million price  — Proceeds of about $50 million would help company pay off debt

item.title: ソニー・ピクチャーズ・ネットワークス・インディア、新マネージング・ディレクター兼CEOにDisney+ Hotstarコンテンツチーフのガウラヴ・バナジー氏を指名（Jesse Whittock/Deadline）
item.description:
Jesse Whittock / Deadline:
Sony Pictures Networks India names Disney+ Hotstar content chief Gaurav Banerjee as its new Managing Director and CEO  —  Sony Pictures Networks India has named Disney+ Hotstar content chief Gaurav Banerjee as its new Managing Director and CEO.  —  He'll replace N.P. Singh …

item.title: ブライアン・ロバーツ、ジョン・マローン、バリー・ディラー、テッド・サランドスなど～12人のメディア幹部が、ストリーミング、バンドル、広告などの未来についてインタビュー（ニューヨーク・タイムズ紙）
item.description:
New York Times:
Interviews with ~12 media executives, such as Brian Roberts, John Malone, Barry Diller, and Ted Sarandos, about the future of streaming, bundling, ads, and more  —  Who will survive?  Die?  Thrive?  And how?  We talked to nearly a dozen top media executives and asked them to predict what lies ahead.

item.title: 情報筋Netflixは、欧州やアジアなど一部の市場で無料版サービスの創設を検討しているが、米国での無料プランは検討していない（Bloomberg）。
item.description:
Bloomberg:
Sources: Netflix has discussed creating free versions of its service in some markets, namely in Europe and Asia, but is not considering a free plan in the US  —  While Netflix is the biggest streaming service in Hollywood, it is barely in the top 10 for advertisers.

item.title: Acorn TVの成功、FASTチャンネルの可能性などについて、AMC Networksのストリーミング担当EVPであるDon Klees氏とCourtney Thomasma氏とのQ&A（Josef Adalian/Vulture）
item.description:
Josef Adalian / Vulture:
Q&A with Don Klees, Acorn TV SVP of programming, and Courtney Thomasma, AMC Networks EVP of streaming, on Acorn TV's success, FAST channel potential, and more  —  This story first ran in Buffering, Vulture's newsletter about the streaming industry.  Head to vulture.com/buffering and subscribe today!

item.title: 地元の非営利ニュースルーム「Mountain State Spotlight」、「Outlier Media」、「Signal Ohio」がどのように地域社会に貢献しているか、また、その活動を継続するために何が必要か（Elizabeth Djinis/Poynter）
item.description:
Elizabeth Djinis / Poynter:
How local nonprofit newsrooms Mountain State Spotlight, Outlier Media, and Signal Ohio are serving their communities, and what they need to continue their work  —  These organizations are revolutionizing journalism at every level: how they are funded, how they write their stories and even how they find them.
